#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int sum=0;
        string str;
        cin>>str;
        for(i=0;i<str.length();i++)
        {
            if(str[i]=='0'||str[i]=='1'||str[i]=='2'||str[i]=='3'||str[i]=='4'||str[i]=='5'||str[i]=='6'||str[i]=='7'||str[i]=='8'||str[i]=='9')
                sum=sum+(str[i]-'0');
        }
        cout<<sum<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
